name: append(length:allocator:deallocator:range:flags:)
desc: Adds a memory block to a block buffer using a custom allocator and deallocator.
declaration: func append(length: Int, allocator: @escaping CMBlockBuffer.CustomBlockAllocator, deallocator: @escaping CMBlockBuffer.CustomBlockDeallocator, range: Range<Int>? = nil, flags: CMBlockBuffer.Flags = []) throws
